speaker: Mary
text: *Mary fiddles with her cup of tea.* So, Dad... You remember how I told you about my Artificial Intelligence class? It's been... *She bites her lip, searching for the right word.* Interesting.

speaker: Dad
text: *Dad chuckles, leaning back in his chair.* Oh, 'interesting' you say? That's... quite vague, sweetheart. What do you mean?

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary smiles a little.* It's just... complex, you know? Like, we're creating these models that can think, in a way. They can learn and adapt. But there's also an element of uncertainty... it's kind of scary, in a way.

speaker: Dad
text: *Dad nods thoughtfully.* That's part of the adventure, Mary. All new technology brings a certain level of uncertainty. But I trust in you and your ability to navigate this complex world. You've always been so good at solving puzzles.

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary laughs, her spirits visibly lifted.* Remember those puzzle boxes you used to bring home for me? I loved those... *Her mind drifts off, smiling at the memory.*

speaker: Dad
text: *Dad laughs too, a twinkle in his eye.* Oh, I remember! You wouldn't sleep until you'd solved them. That's my girl. *He smiles, reminiscing.*

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary's smile turns a bit sad, but she quickly pushes away the melancholy.* But yeah, school is going well... I've made some good friends. There's this guy, Alex... He's really sweet. He helps me a lot in the class, actually.

speaker: Dad
text: *Dad raises an eyebrow playfully.* Oh, 'Alex,' huh? Sounds like someone's got a little crush.

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary blushes, waving her hands dismissively.* No, Dad! It's not like that... He's just a friend.

speaker: Dad
text: *Dad chuckles, holding his hands up in surrender.* Alright, alright. Just teasing. I'm glad you're making friends, Mary.
